com.aliyun.oss.crypto

接口 EncryptionMaterials

  • 所有已知实现类:
    KmsEncryptionMaterials, SimpleRSAEncryptionMaterials

    public interface EncryptionMaterials
    EncryptionMaterials is an interface used to implement different encrypt/decrypt content materials providers.

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void decryptCEK(ContentCryptoMaterialRW contentMaterial)
      Decrypt the secured cek and secured iv and put the result into the given ContentCryptoMaterialRW instance
      void encryptCEK(ContentCryptoMaterialRW contentMaterial)
      Encrypt the cek and iv and put the result into the given ContentCryptoMaterialRW instance.

    • 方法详细资料

      • encryptCEK

        void encryptCEK(ContentCryptoMaterialRW contentMaterial)
        Encrypt the cek and iv and put the result into the given ContentCryptoMaterialRW instance.
        参数:
        contentMaterial - The materials that contans the content crypto info.

      • decryptCEK

        void decryptCEK(ContentCryptoMaterialRW contentMaterial)
        Decrypt the secured cek and secured iv and put the result into the given ContentCryptoMaterialRW instance
        参数:
        contentMaterial - The materials that contans the content crypto info.
